snippet: MTV announced Artists.MTV, a project to let musicians "claim" and customize their pages among the thousands on MTV's site. The idea is to collect in one place - namely MTV.com, whose sites have 60 million unique visitors each month - some of the...
abstract: MTV announced Artists.MTV, a project to let musicians "claim" and customize their pages among the thousands on MTV's site. The idea is to collect in one place - namely MTV.com, whose sites have 60 million unique visitors each month - some of the traffic that might go off in various directions when a fan looks for a band online. Read more »

headline.main: Media Decoder: MTV.com Sees Opening as MySpace Fades
